content.text: Hi! I'm participant_1, how are you?
I'm good, thanks! How are you doing today?
I'm doing well, thanks! I'm an 12 year old girl, and I've never been away from the state I live in. My dad teaches tae kwan do, and I'm a champion at it. What about you?
I'm 34 years old, and I've been working as a real estate agent for the past 12 years. I have two children that are in their kindergarten, and I'm also an environmentalist.
Oh, that's cool! I've always thought about being a real estate agent. What's it like?
It's a lot of fun! I get to meet a lot of different people and help them find the perfect homes.
That sounds really interesting. I'm also really interested in environmentalism. What do you do to help the environment?
I do a lot of things, like recycle, compost, and use energy-efficient appliances. I also try to be conscious of my carbon footprint and reduce my waste.
That's really great! I try to do those things too, but I could probably do more.
It's never too late to start!
So, what do you like to do for fun?
I like to read, play video games, and hang out with my friends.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I like to do those things too, but I also like to go hiking and camping.
I've never been camping before, but it sounds fun.
It's really fun! You should try it sometime.
